column3: aber a Sanballat tsee dɛ yɛrotow fasu no

column2: "Na ɔkasae wɔ no nuanom na Samaria dɔm no enyim
column3: see dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na Judafo mberɛmberɛwfo reyɛ yi? Ana wɔbɛyɛ hɔnho dzendzen a? Ana wɔbɔbɔ afɔr a? Ana wobowie no dakor a? Ana wobenyanyan abo no efi wura ekuwekuw a wɔahyehyew yi mu?"

column2: "Afei nna Ammonnyi Tobia wɔ ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔno so see dɛ
Hɛn Nyankopɔn e
column5: na woebu hɛn enyimtsia; na dan hɔn adapaabɔ bua hɔnankasa hɔn etsifi
column6: na gyaa hɔn ma ɔfom wɔ ndɔmmumkɔ asaase do:"

column3: na mma wɔmmpepa hɔn bɔn so mmfi w’enyim: osiandɛ woeyi wo ebufuw wɔ adantofo no enyim."

column2: "Nna yɛtoow fasu no; na fasu no nyinara wɔtoatoae kodur no krɔn ne fa do: osiandɛ ɔman no nyaa pɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ edwuma."

column3: aber a Sanballat
column7: na Ashdodfo no tsee dɛ Jerusalɛm afasu no ne mmiamiamu no akɔ kan
column8: na etokur no ahyɛ ase risisiw no

column2: "na hɔn nyinara kɔr apam yɛɛ kor dɛ wɔreba na wɔnye Jerusalɛm abɔko
column3: na wɔayɛ ma no mu ayɛ sakasaka."
yɛbɔɔ hɛn mpaa kyerɛɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn
column5: yesisii do aweɔmfo adzekyee na adzesaa."

column3: Ndzesoadzefo no hɔn ahoɔdzen asa
column4: na wura no so dɔɔ so; ma dɛm ntsi yenntum nntow fasu no."

column3: Mma wɔnntse
column7: na yɛama edwuma no etwa sin."

column3: aber a Judafo a wɔtsetse hɔn nkyɛn no bae no
column5: Wofi mbeambea nyinara bɛba hom do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi medze nyimpa sisii ɔkwan a ɔwɔ fasu no n’ekyir asease no do hɔ
column3: wɔ guadoguado
column4: na medze ɔman no sisii hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee

column3: na mosoɛree
column6: na ɔman no nkaa no dɛ
column7: Mma hom nnsuro hɔn: hom nkaa EWURADZE a no ho yɛ hu no
column8: na hom nko mma hom nuanom

column3: aber a hɛn atamfo no tsee dɛ yɛatse
column4: na Nyankopɔn ama hɔn egyinatu ayɛ gyan no
column5: nna hɛn nyinara sanee kɔr fasu no ho

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ber no do dze kɔ no
column3: mo nkowaa mu fa foraa mu yɛɛ edwuma
column4: na hɔn mu fa so dzedze mpeaa
column7: na dadzentar; na mpanyimfo no so gyinaa Juda fi nyinara ekyir."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtoow fasu no na hɔn a wɔsoasoaa ndzesoadze no miaa hɔnho
column3: obiara dze ne nsa kor yɛɛ edwuma
column4: na ɔdze kor no so suoo n’akodze mu;"

column2: "na adantofo no mu obiara bɔɔ n’afona wɔ ne nkyɛnmu
column3: na wɔdze no dɛm dze towee. Nna nyia ɔhɛn abɛn no wɔ me nkyɛn."
na mpanyimfo no
column4: na ɔman no nkaa no dɛ
column5: Edwuma no so na no mu trɛ
column6: na hɛn so hɛn mu ebuebue wɔ fasu no do ɔbaako na ɔbaako so ntamu twe:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi beebiara a hom bɛtse abɛn ndze no
column3: hom ntsia homho ndan mbra hɛn nkyɛn wɔ hɔ; hɛn Nyankopɔn bɔko ama hɛn."

column2: "Dɛm na yɛyɛɛ edwuma no: na hɔn mu fa dzedze mpeaa fi adzekyee araa kodur dɛ nworaba puepuei."
"Dɛmara so na ber no ara mu no mesee ɔman no dɛ
column3: Wɔmma obiara nye n’akowaa nda wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: ma wɔnyɛ aweɔmfo mma hɛn anadwe

column3: na mo nuanom
column5: na mbarimba aweɔmfo so a wodzi m’ekyir no
column6: hɛn mu biara yerinnyiyi hɛn ntar
column7: obiara dze n’akodze wɔ ne nsamu."
